Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.0.2

Mods installed:

![R3a2ObR.png](http://i.imgur.com/R3a2ObR.png)

Reproduction steps:

Unkown.

Problem:

![BZBQtFZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BZBQtFZ.jpg)Physics seems to be VERY broken, prograde markers broken, gravity seems hacked when it isn't, navball showing 174m/s when on the launchpad.

Reproduction steps:

Unknown, happened after installing a few BahamutoD mods.

Log:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/w5x0fakekcs9268/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/w5x0fakekcs9268/output_log.txt?dl=0)
I have narrowed the issue down to the Mk1-2

You did, of course, try uninstalling the mods you thought to be related to it, right?

Are your mods up to date?

Are there any incompatibilities between your mods?

The speed showing on the navball is suspiciously identical to Kerbin's surface rotational speed (it should read ~174m/s in orbital mode on the pad). Looks like something is hijacking surface mode and putting orbital data in it.
Not only is the navball messed up, but if I actually launch, physics stops making sense!
